text.section: A therapy management contract shall apply only to conditions for which protocols have been agreed to by a licensed physician and a licensed pharmacist in accordance with the regulations adopted under this subtitle.
A therapy management contract shall terminate 1 year from the date of its signing, unless renewed by the licensed physician, licensed pharmacist, and patient.
Any party to the therapy management contract may terminate the contract at any time.
The Board of Pharmacy may assess a fee, as established in regulation, for approval of a pharmacist to enter into a physician-pharmacist agreement.
